positions.subtitle: Deutsche Bank
positions.description: Worked as part of the FIM Decommissioning team to migrate data feeds from a legacy Map-Reduce architecture to a Spark-based infrastructure. Successfully implemented mapping logic by thoroughly analyzing business and functional requirements. Evaluated the legacy workflow to develop an improved approach, enhancing code quality and reducing computation time by refactoring the existing archetype for Spark jobs, orchestration, and configuration services.Independently delivered the end-to-end feed solution, including setting up the CI/CD pipeline and conducting regression and integration tests on the final build to ensure maximum accuracy.Acquired hands-on experience with:- Spark for distributed data processing, managing datasets of up to 10TB.- Java for application development, improving performance by 25%.- Big Data Management for handling large-scale data, ensuring efficient data processing.- CI/CD practices for automated deployment, decreasing deployment errors by 20%.- Jenkins for continuous integration, enhancing build efficiency.- uDeploy for continuous delivery, streamlining the release process.- Full Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) practices, ensuring robust and reliable software solutions.
positions.title: Associate Engineer
positions.description_html:
Worked as part of the FIM Decommissioning team to migrate data feeds from a legacy Map-Reduce architecture to a Spark-based infrastructure. Successfully implemented mapping logic by thoroughly analyzing business and functional requirements. Evaluated the legacy workflow to develop an improved approach, enhancing code quality and reducing computation time by refactoring the existing archetype for Spark jobs, orchestration, and configuration services.


Independently delivered the end-to-end feed solution, including setting up the CI/CD pipeline and conducting regression and integration tests on the final build to ensure maximum accuracy.

Acquired hands-on experience with:
- Spark for distributed data processing, managing datasets of up to 10TB.
- Java for application development, improving performance by 25%.
- Big Data Management for handling large-scale data, ensuring efficient data processing.
- CI/CD practices for automated deployment, decreasing deployment errors by 20%.
- Jenkins for continuous integration, enhancing build efficiency.
- uDeploy for continuous delivery, streamlining the release process.
- Full Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) practices, ensuring robust and reliable software solutions.

positions.subtitle: Deutsche Bank
positions.description: Designed a microservice-based architecture to package incoming feeds/data packets into blocks, reducing data transformation time.Developed a data preprocessor service, centralizing preprocessing tasks and enabling consumers to register via REST endpoints, reducing computation time by 50%.Orchestrated the technical architecture of a Packaging Service and  Prerproccessor Service, including technology stack, data flow, database management, deployment, and REST APIs.Developed 20+ RESTful APIs for logging, regenerating, and approving data packages with metadata across four departments. Implemented OAuth2 authentication and role-based authorization.Created unit and integration test cases, performing testing with Postman.
positions.title: Graduate Analyst
positions.description_html:
Designed a microservice-based architecture to package incoming feeds/data packets into blocks, reducing data transformation time.
Developed a data preprocessor service, centralizing preprocessing tasks and enabling consumers to register via REST endpoints, reducing computation time by 50%.
Orchestrated the technical architecture of a Packaging Service and Prerproccessor Service, including technology stack, data flow, database management, deployment, and REST APIs.
Developed 20+ RESTful APIs for logging, regenerating, and approving data packages with metadata across four departments. Implemented OAuth2 authentication and role-based authorization.
Created unit and integration test cases, performing testing with Postman.

experience.title: Analyst Intern
experience.description: Designed and implemented an automated module for proactive and reactive data quality monitoring of customer and business demographics data as part of the Customer 360 team in Enterprise Digital Analytics. Leveraged the K-means clustering algorithm to identify feature vectors from raw data, effectively filtering out out-of-pattern records and enhancing data accuracy and consistency.Developed a comprehensive feature extraction process, including data cleaning, normalization, dimensionality reduction, and feature selection, to prepare high-quality input data for clustering.Improved the reliability of demographic data by detecting and removing anomalies through advanced machine learning techniques.Gained extensive hands-on experience with PySpark for large-scale data processing and distributed computing.Implemented CI/CD pipelines, ensuring smooth integration and deployment processes.Conducted in-depth data analysis to derive actionable insights and ensure data quality.Utilized SQL for complex data extraction and manipulation tasks.
experience.description_html: Designed and implemented an automated module for proactive and reactive data quality monitoring of customer and business demographics data as part of the Customer 360 team in Enterprise Digital Analytics. Leveraged the K-means clustering algorithm to identify feature vectors from raw data, effectively filtering out out-of-pattern records and enhancing data accuracy and consistency.Developed a comprehensive feature extraction process, including data cleaning, normalization, dimensionality reduction, and feature selection, to prepare high-quality input data for clustering.Improved the reliability of demographic data by detecting and removing anomalies through advanced machine learning techniques.Gained extensive hands-on experience with PySpark for large-scale data processing and distributed computing.Implemented CI/CD pipelines, ensuring smooth integration and deployment processes.Conducted in-depth data analysis to derive actionable insights and ensure data quality.Utilized SQL for complex data extraction and manipulation tasks.

recommendations: Pratap Singh “I am pleased to write this recommendation for Sudiksha, who worked as an Associate Engineer in Deutsche Bank, India. Sudiksha has an exceptional knowledge in technologies like Java, Big Data, and Spark. During her tenure with our company, Sudiksha consistently demonstrated her strong analytical skills and problem-solving abilities. She actively contributed to critical projects after learning and utilizing her deep understanding of Java and Spark. She is an excellent team player and a pleasure to work with. She is always willing to share her knowledge and lend a helping hand to her colleagues. Her dedication and commitment to delivering high-quality work are truly outstanding. I highly recommend Sudiksha for any role that requires expertise in Java, Big Data, and Spark. She is a valuable asset to any organization and will undoubtedly make a significant impact wherever she goes. Best regards, Pratap Singh”

projects: [{"title":"TripTonic","start_date":"Jan 2023","description":"Developed a smart travel planning app using React, TypeScript, Node.js, MongoDB, and OpenAI for prompt engineering. The app allowed users to create personalized trip itineraries by analyzing inputs for details like locations, dates, and activities. Generated comprehensive itineraries with suggested attractions and transportation, allowing users to modify, save, and share their plans, and receive real-time updates via Firebase Cloud Messaging. The app featured secure authentication with OAuth2 and Google Sign-In, integrated APIs like Google Maps, hosted on AWS, ensuring a reliable and enjoyable planning experience."}]
